interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Akago 28 Hole Makeup Brush Tree Holder Organizer Folding Collapsible Air Drying Tower Brush Dryer Review Date: 2015/12/07 Store: QGAKAGO Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Special Feature': 'Portable, Foldable', 'Brand': 'QGAKAGO', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Package Type': 'Standard Packaging', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Mounting Type Tabletop Mount': '', '': 'Item Weight 0.4 Pounds', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.1 x 5.9 x 1.4 inches; 6.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'CA014', 'UPC': '736950050511'} Review Text: I am a makeup junkie and I can tell you the worst thing about wearing makeup is cleaning the brushes. Usually when I clean my brushes I clean them all at one time creating a huge mess and taking up my whole counter area as they are laying out to dry. This brush holder works like a charm and is very compact. It is very easy to assemble just connect the legs and its good to go. This hold 28 brushes so it works great for me. As I can fill it in no time. There are different slots for different brushes. It holds the brushes well and in place and I think because of them being upside down makes them dry faster and help hold their shape. Love this new tool and now I dont dread cleaning my brushes any longer.
I received this brush holder for free for testing and reviewing purposes. This is my honest unbiased opinion and have come to it by using the holder myself. Review Title: ... a makeup junkie and I can tell you the worst thing about wearing makeup is cleaning the brushes Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Real Smoothness Unrefined African Shea Butter for Skin and Hair, 16 oz Real Smoothness {'Brand': 'Real Smoothness', 'Item Form': 'Butter', 'Unit Count': '1 count', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Item Volume': '473 Milliliters', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.35 x 2.17 x 0.79 inches; 2.15 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'REALSHEA', 'UPC': '784672309981'} I am a huge fan of shea butter! I use it in several receipes as I am always making lotions, or salves. This brick of shea butter does not disappoint. It has the nutty earthy aroma which is normal for shea butter. This melted down evenly. I was able to easily blend it with other ingredients very easily. I had no issues with this product at all The best part is it came with a free bottle of lavender. Well that just gave me the go ahead to make some whipped shea butter lotion. I put the shea butter melted it down, with some coconut oil, and cocoa butter and then added about 30 drops of the lavender to make me some great lotion. All ingredients are good for the skin and will heal all dry skin issues.
I received this product for free for testing and reviewing purposes, this is my honest and unbiased opinion. This brick of shea butter does not disappoint. It has the nutty earthy aroma which is ... profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

The user continues to demonstrate a strong preference for natural skincare products, particularly those rich in nourishing ingredients like shea butter. Their interest in DIY skincare remains evident, as they enjoy blending ingredients to create personalized lotions and salves that enhance the efficacy of their homemade recipes. The user appreciates the sensory aspects of products, particularly the pleasant earthy aroma of shea butter, and favors holistic options, indicating a trend towards complementary items such as lavender in their routines.

Recent interactions reveal the user is also passionate about makeup, particularly the maintenance of their tools. They have adopted a practical solution for cleaning makeup brushes, showcasing a balanced approach to beauty that values both effective skincare and makeup application. The enthusiasm for tools that streamline their beauty regimen complements their commitment to quality and utility across both skincare and makeup.

Overall, the user embodies a holistic and health-conscious approach to beauty practices, valuing sensory enjoyment, effective natural solutions, and now also the organization and upkeep of their makeup tools. Their ongoing pursuit of sustainable and enjoyable beauty practices highlights a dedication to enhancing their overall self-care routine.
